Package com.blogspot.javapeanuts.jarachis.time

Time-related utility classes: org.blogspot.javapeanuts.jarachis.time.TimeSource interface and its subclasses.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TimeSource
    This interface represents an abstraction whose purpose is decoupling time providing strategy from time clients.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstantTimeSource
    TimeSource implementation which returns a fixed current time.
    SequentialTimeSource
    TimeSource implementation which returns an element of initially provided sequence of values at every currentTime[Millis] invocation.
    SystemTimeSource
    System-time based implementation of TimeSource.
